table.name: servprov_alias
table.description: This table stores the alias names for the service providers associated with the qualifiers. For example JBHT is the alias for JBHUNT under the SCAC qualifier.

columns.name: SERVPROV_GID
columns.description: The GID for the service provider.

columns.name: SERVPROV_ALIAS_QUAL_GID
columns.description: The GID for the service provider alias qualifier.

columns.name: ALIAS
columns.description: Alias provides an alternate way of identifying service providers. For example, you may want to set up an alias that identifies the SCAC of a service provider.  Alternatively, you may want to set up an alias for XY-Z company with a Qualifier ID of SCAC and an alias of ZXY.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
